text.0: to agni to this god of yours i sing aloud with utmost power.
text.1: may he come to us with the gods and sit best offerer on the grass.
text.2: the holy whose are earth and heaven and succour waits upon his strength.
text.3: him men who bring oblations laud and they who wish to gain for grace.
text.4: he is the sage who guides these men leader of sacred rites is he.
text.5: him your own agni serve ye well who winneth and bestoweth wealth.
text.6: so may the gracious agni grant most goodly shelter for our use.
text.7: whence in the heavens or in the floods he shall pour wealth upon our lands.
text.8: the singers kindle him the priest agni the lord of tribes of men.
text.9: resplendent and without a peer through his own excellent designs.
text.10: help us thou brahman best of all invokers of the gods in song.
text.11: beam friend of maruts bliss on us o agni a most liberal god.
text.12: yea grant us treasure thousandfold with children and with nourishment.
text.13: and agni splendid hero strength exalted wasting not away.
